title: When someone insults you in perfect grammar and punctuation..

replies.body: I think it's getting downvoted so that people don't have to see it...

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5xeFwFeL,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-19T11:46:57.934+0000)
>
> http://i253.photobucket.com/albums/hh62/NIKDSC5/23837073_zps34b496c0.jpg

your wrong, but your entire to youre opinion
Is typing with proper grammar and punctuation really that notable? I've gotten a lot of attention for it lately.

> [{quoted}](name=Dragonzzilla,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=5xeFwFeL,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-18T21:02:03.972+0000)
>
> Is typing with proper grammar and punctuation really that notable? I've gotten a lot of attention for it lately.

On the internet? Absolutely.
Why do you think Your Grammar Sucks is a thing?

No, My Grammar Is Completely Correct. You Simpleton Peasants Cannot Judge Me For Being Right.

(Please don't kill me, I use proper grammar :c)

You've made an error. Your insult should read:

"No. My grammar is completely correct. You simpleton peasants cannot judge me for being right."

Do you now see the error of your ways, you simpleton peasant?

Actually, you've made a mistake.

"No. My grammar is completely correct."

I think you meant, "No, my grammar is completely correct."
git got
Technically, either one of our phrasings is correct. Technically correct is the best kind of correct.
I get told to stop using good grammar and punctuation. I'm just like... YOU JELLY, BRAH? Even the slang and meme stuff is all kept in perfect grammar and punctuation.

People often think I'm a girl 'cause of my grammar, the way my names sound and how I like to use those little faces. :P

It really is kind of sad that grammar is such a rarity on the internet (and in general) these days that it stands out so much. Even people who DO use grammar don't really sound natural as they talk, and you can tell that they're forcing it. Plus, I don't think I've ever seen anyone but me use a semicolon on the internet. xD
Some people just have no respect for the Oxford Comma these days....
